markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ivory Baton](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1492)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Monsters of Myth](/Sources.aspx?ID=107) pg. 125</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This white, slender rod bears intricately carved reliefs of magnificent animals that bow and dance to some unseen commander. The baton enables you to command [constructs](/Traits.aspx?ID=35).

<document level="2" id="action-1123" />

<document level="2" id="action-1124" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 13"
pfs="Standard"
>
Ivory Baton
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Monsters of Myth](/Sources.aspx?ID=107) pg. 125</row>

**Price** 2,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 19"
pfs="Standard"
>
Ivory Baton (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Monsters of Myth](/Sources.aspx?ID=107) pg. 125</row>

**Price** 35,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1

</row>

</column>

---

When you activate the baton, it has the effects of a 9th-level _dominate_ with the adjustments above. The DC is 39.
name: Ivory Baton
